pages.text: $(item)Lubricant/$ is required for crafting $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#speed)Speed Upgrades/$.$(p)It is created in a $(l:manufacturing/thermopneumatic_processing_plant)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ with $(l:manufacturing/refinery)Diesel/$ (or $(l:renewables/biodiesel)Biodiesel/$) and $(item)Redstone/$.
